results.title: Candesartan- and atenolol-based treatments induce different patterns of carotid artery and left ventricular remodeling in hypertension.

results.title: Modulation of microRNAs in hypertension-induced arterial remodeling through the beta1 and beta3-adrenoreceptor pathways.
results.text_hl: Moreover, both @GENE_NEB @GENE_311029 @@@NEB@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@ATN@@@ showed to have protective effects on @CHEMICAL_Salts @CHEMICAL_MESH:D012492 @@@salt@@@-induced @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@, oxidative stress, and vascular @<m>DISEASE_Ventricular_Remodeling</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020257 @@@remodeling@@@.

results.title: Atenolol is inferior to metoprolol in improving left ventricular function and preventing ventricular remodeling in dogs with heart failure.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@Atenolol@@@ is inferior to @CHEMICAL_Metoprolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008790 @@@metoprolol@@@ in improving left ventricular function and preventing @<m>DISEASE_Ventricular_Remodeling</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020257 @@@ventricular remodeling@@@ in @SPECIES_9615 @@@dogs@@@ with @DISEASE_Heart_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@heart failure@@@.

results.title: Lower plasma noradrenaline and blood viscosity on carvedilol vs atenolol in men with recent myocardial infarction.
results.text_hl: The @CHEMICAL_Carvedilol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077261 @@@Carvedilol@@@ @DISEASE_Myocardial_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D009203 @@@Acute Myocardial Infarction@@@ Study (CAMIS) investigates @<m>DISEASE_Ventricular_Remodeling</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020257 @@@cardiac remodeling@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ (n = 250) randomized to @CHEMICAL_Carvedilol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077261 @@@carvedilol@@@ vs @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ and treated for 12 months after @DISEASE_Myocardial_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D009203 @@@acute myocardial infarction@@@.

citations.NLM: Jonsson G, Fossum E, Kjeldsen SE, Høieggen A, Os I, Eide I, Westheim A. Lower plasma noradrenaline and blood viscosity on carvedilol vs atenolol in men with recent myocardial infarction. Blood Press. 2002;11(6):377-84. PMID: 12523682

results.title: Regional myocardial tissue blood flow during sequential beta 1- and beta 2-adrenergic blockade in cat hearts with acute ischaemia.
results.text_hl: Ten animals first received a beta 1-blocking agent (@<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@) followed by a beta 2-blocking agent (@CHEMICAL_IPS_339 @CHEMICAL_MESH:C014898 @@@IPS 339@@@).

results.title: Mechanisms of the beneficial effects of beta-adrenoceptor antagonists in congestive heart failure.
results.text_hl: These agents attenuate the effects of sympathetic activation during the development of @DISEASE_Heart_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@heart failure@@@, prevent @<m>DISEASE_Ventricular_Remodeling</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020257 @@@ventricular remodelling@@@ and improve cardiac function.

results.title: Postmyocardial infarction remodeling and coronary reserve: effects of ivabradine and beta blockade therapy.
results.journal: Am J Physiol Heart Circ Physiol
results.text_hl: We compared the effects of heart rate reduction (HRR) by the hyperpolarization-activated pacemaker current (@GENE_CBLIF @GENE_29319 @@@I(f)@@@) channel inhibitor @CHEMICAL_Ivabradine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077550 @@@ivabradine@@@ (MI+Iva) and the @GENE_UGT1A1 @GENE_24861 @@@beta(1)@@@-blocker @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ (MI+Aten) on @<m>DISEASE_Ventricular_Remodeling</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020257 @@@ventricular remodeling@@@ and perfusion after @DISEASE_Myocardial_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D009203 @@@myocardial infarction@@@ (MI) in middle-aged (12 mo) Sprague-Dawley @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

citations.NLM: Christensen LP, Zhang RL, Zheng W, Campanelli JJ, Dedkov EI, Weiss RM, Tomanek RJ. Postmyocardial infarction remodeling and coronary reserve: effects of ivabradine and beta blockade therapy. Am J Physiol Heart Circ Physiol. 2009 Jul;297(1):H322-30. PMID: 19411283
